page.title: 20EVERYDAY LIFE & ADDENDA
page.content:
Quite a few people go to the{Wallop {Brook,}which runs through{Broughton,} to paddle in it. Others go to enjoy the scenery, there is also a camping site in a field next to it. There are lots of fish in the{Wallop Brook}and people come to fish in it, there are two main sorts of fish that people catch,{Trout}and{Minnows}and other small fish.
{NOTES ON AMENITIES COUNT {________________________ The{VILLAGE HALL}is situated at map reference 310327 The{POST OFFICE & GENERAL STORES}is counted under both headings. The{GARAGE}does NOT serve petrol! {BUS SERVICES}include Village Bus trips where destinations vary but are counted as one service.
